description: At this restaurant in the historic centre, where the vaulted brick ceiling provides a striking contrast with the modern furnishings, the chef celebrates the seasons through a whole range of ingredients to create truly delicious cuisine. Interesting tasting menus add to its appeal.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
